Room.Name: Adlermann Way/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Islandia Drive and Adlermann Way.
Room.LongDescription: Islandia Drive heads off to the east from Adlermann Way, which runs north and south. On the southeast side of the road is the Bendine Aquarium and Marina. To the west, you can see the impressive City Walls, which tower above the ground, overlooking the Respital Sea and the Nylandian Bay, protecting Oceancrest from invasions.
